pages.description: Triplex is a game played by 2 people over 3 connected boards
The goal of both players is to make a row of 3 with each type of piece
Pieces can be matched horizontally on each board and vertically between boards
Diagonals are not allowed in any direction
Each player has 3 of each kind of piece as well as a wild piece that can function as any other piece
Players take turns placing pieces until all their pieces are on the board
After all the pieces are placed, players take turns moving their pieces to empty spaces on the board
Once a player matches all 3 types of pieces they win the match!
